narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Independent Opportunities, Inc. is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Tulsa, OK. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $6.8M in Medicaid payments across 32K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $6.8M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
